question:
Consider the following statements with respect to the Railway Convention Committee:
  1. The committee consists of members only from Lok Sabha
  2. Railway Minister is the ex-officio chairman of Railway Convention Committee
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: First statement is incorrect because Railway Convention Committee is an ad hoc parliamentary committee which consists of members of both Houses of Parliament. Second statement is incorrect because the Chairman of the Committee is appointed by the Speaker of Lok Sabha
